sentence: Room service was slow it took 45 minutes to an hour for a breakfast or a meal to arrive when the meal or the breakfast finally arrived something was always missing a spoon for the coffee knife for the fruit a plate for the continental breakfast not even a charger plate under the salad bowl
The hotel is a bit pricey but well worth it as it sits in the midst of Boylston Street and is close to all of the shops as well as only a block away from some truly exceptional restaurants
Stopped by the restaurant for business cocktails and hors doeuvres
Breakfast took over half an hour to be delivered in the restaurant
We only had a drink in the other restaurant but it was a nice ambience
When I said that I thought silver holders would be a bit formal for a big pasta feast he agreed and offered to make me some less formal place cards
That rarely hapensThe staff of Bar Bouloud made me feel very cared for again traveling on business without my husband and craving privacy I felt comfortable and never awkward
Traffic and music from restaurants can be a problem even with earplugsThe restaurant for breakfast is not at the level of what a luxury hotel should be
Breakfast was served ala carte and was generally alright served in the Bar Boulard
Next morning at breakfast they got things wrong 3 times took forever and again not particularly gracious
Location is the best as you can walk outside to many shops and restaurants or stay indoors to go to the Prudential indoor mall without going outside
I love the little leather dish on the nightstand to hold watch or earrings
They served appetizers that were wonderful
My my a perfect dinner endingWe also were charmed to meet Christophe the manager who made us feel we were very much in competent hands
I went to the hotel for Bar Boudon a delicious brunch place
Staff services restaurant fitness center and of course rooms are highest quality
Breakfast was excellent each day as was the dinner we had one evening
Having breakfast at Bar Boulud is definitely the best thing one can ask for a hearty breakfast
While all the selections were of top quality as local I have to say that the clam chowder was almost as good as my mom makes
The food at the Bar Boulud was exceptional
